title: The Mail Box Ghost and Other Spooky Tales
description: A haunted mailbox, a jigsaw puzzle that reveals a terrifying secret, an eerie encounter in a deserted forest –you’ll find these and more in this bone chilling collection. Ghosts lurk not only on lonely highways, but do not spare even ordinary everyday objects like telephones. Some are friendly and helpful, but others have designs that are truly malevolent.
author: Deepa Agarwal
